events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but the package has not arrived yet. The tracking information hasn't updated for days.
The system identified this case as a delivery delay issue based on customer message keywords about late shipping and tracking.
The case has been assigned to support agent Laura for follow-up on the delivery delay reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your delayed order and will check the tracking details right away.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can investigate the delay further and update you?
Sure, the order number is 4587231 and the shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield. Thanks for checking on this.
Thank you for the details. I contacted the courier and they confirmed a delay due to weather conditions. We expect delivery within 3 days and will update you promptly.
I appreciate you looking into this. Thanks for the update and I’ll wait for the package. Please keep me posted if there are any more changes.
Your package was successfully delivered today. Please let us know if everything is in order or if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you received your order and that you’re satisfied. Feel free to contact us anytime for support.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our service. Please take a moment to complete it.
